Perceptor::

Perceptor was waitting Megatron's commands, and heard all things tha 
have hapenned among Decepticons' leader and his troops.

At least he diced speak "Great Megatron" said Preceptor "What have I 
to do to show you my loyalty to Decepticon's goals... What're my 
currents duties?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (No reason :)
> 
> Unitron:
> 
> 
> 
> Unitron descended rapidly and transformed to his biped form in mid 
air, 
> crashing into the ground feet first, staying on his feet easily.
> 
> "This is it, eh?" he said as he saw the Dark Avian and showing no 
signs of 
> caring.  "Well, take me to the so-called Megatron immediately.  I 
have more 
> important matters to attend to."
